text:
Hi all I'm still a bit new to HubSpot so forgive me if I missed something obvious,
I've been working on a new blog and wanted to have my own template in my rich text editor. Thus I create a simple module with a rich text field and said template as the default text in my rich field and have added it to my `blog-post.html` file.

Everything is there as it should be, the only issue is that to edit this text I now have to use the sidebar or the expanded view. Is there something I have to do to be able to edit the rich text field as you would by default with the editor directly in the page?
Does anyone know a way to hide an option for the Alignment field? i.e. you don't want to show the middle option.
Anyone know how to set inherited default colors for Gradient fields? And or hide the opacity subfield for them?
